short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension will allow you to modify the transcription screen area as well as the transcription font size.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Powerpoint online has a nice feature for real time translation, but the translation area as well as the font size is too small, this extension will adjust the translation area and font size.
